headline: Americore Resources Corp. Closes Trinity Silver Project Agreement with Newmont
summary: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - November 18, 2025) - Americore Resources Corp. (TSXV: AMCO) (OTCQB: AMCOF) (FSE: 5GP) ("Americore" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that it has completed the first payment under its previously announced Trinity Silver Project agreement (the "Agreement") with Newmont Corporation ("Newmont"), originally announced on September 17, 2025.Under the terms of the Agreement, Americore has issued 100,000 common shares to Newmont and has paid the...

headline: Newmont (NEM): Assessing Valuation After Recent Share Gains and Analyst Projections
summary: Newmont (NEM) shares have seen a mix of moves lately, with the stock retracing 1% in the past week while remaining up nearly 30% over the past 3 months. Recent performance has caught the attention of investors looking for value in the materials sector. See our latest analysis for Newmont. Newmont's momentum is clearly building. After a massive run this year, the shares are now consolidating near recent highs. While the pace has cooled in the past month, the long-term picture is strong, with a...
